original_text: The Lord will choose other people to rule over you. They are people that you wanted to be your friends, but now they will have power over you. So what will you say about that? You will be afraid and in much pain, like a woman who is giving birth to a baby. The Lord will choose other people to rule over you. They are people that you wanted to be your friends, but now they will have power over you. So what will you say about that? You will be afraid and in much pain, like a woman who is giving birth to a baby. The Lord will choose other people to rule over you.
korean_text: 너의 친구 삼았던 자를 그가 네 위에 우두머리로 세우실 때에 네가 무슨 말을 하겠느냐 네가 고통에 사로잡힘이 산고를 겪는 여인 같지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The Lord will choose other people
that you wanted to be your friends
but now they will have power over you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그들이 당신 위에 권세를 갖게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So what will you say about that?

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 고통 속에 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who is giving birth to a baby
The Lord will choose other people to rule over you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 당신을 다스리기 위해 다른 사람들을 선택하실 것입니다
